data.title: 1985–1998: The Foundations for the Kinnock Reforms
data.meta_description: The year 1985 marked a turning point in European activism and, more specifically, in the Commission’s political life. The decade during which Jacques Delors was President of the Commission witnessed the most fruitful relaunch of European integration and policy...
